title: Bikerumor Pic Of The Day: Mont-Royal, Montreal
content:
Photo submitted by Jan Goh, “I ride up Mont-Royal almost every day, literally hundreds of times a year. We have to enjoy breaks like this now before we’re under the snow in a couple of months. We always love seeing photos from where you are riding and are happy to share them with our readers

The post Bikerumor Pic Of The Day: Mont-Royal, Montreal appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Kristi Benedict
